Donnie Kirkpatrick is an either year coach at ECU but this is his third season with Ruffin McNeill and his coaching staff PERIOD Kirkpatrick is an insider receiver coach and he is also in charge of recruiting PERIOD

As the recruiting coordinator Kirkpatricks hands are in everything involved with recruits and possible official visits PERIOD Wednesday was National Signing day and Kirkpatrick along with the other coaches had a specific role in getting the  players who will play for ECU in the fall PERIOD
